title: Affiliate Program
heroDescription: Earn money by referring new users to Lamix. Get paid for every successful referral and track your progress with our comprehensive dashboard.
earnDescription: Get paid when your referrals upgrade to premium
slugHelp: 4-12 characters, letters and numbers only. Example: ABC123
step1Description: Generate your unique affiliate link with a custom slug
step2Description: Share your link on social media, blogs, or anywhere online
step3Description: When someone clicks your link and signs up, they become your referral
step4Description: Get paid $5 for every referral that upgrades to premium
noReferralsTitle: No referrals yet. Share your link to get started!
slugFormatError: Slug must be 4-12 characters and contain only letters and numbers
pageDescription: Join our affiliate program and earn money by referring new users to Lamix.
bankingDescription: Manage your payment methods and payout settings for affiliate commissions.
bankingPageDescription: Manage your banking information and payment methods for affiliate commission payouts.
fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
confirmRemovePaymentMethod: Are you sure you want to remove this payment method?
choose_your_plan_description: Join thousands of affiliates earning money through referrals
feature_earn_money_desc: Get paid $5 for every successful referral
feature_track_progress_desc: Comprehensive dashboard to monitor your performance
feature_priority_support_desc: Get priority support as an affiliate partner
testimonial_text_1: The affiliate program helped me earn extra income easily!
testimonial_text_2: Great dashboard and support. Highly recommend!
testimonial_text_3: Started with referrals and now it's my main income source.
faq_q1: How does the affiliate program work?
faq_a1: You earn money by referring new users who sign up and upgrade to premium.
faq_q2: How much do I earn per referral?
faq_a2: You earn $5 for each successful conversion.
faq_a3: Payments are processed weekly or monthly based on your settings.
try_before_commit_desc: Experience premium features with a day pass
premiumRequiredDesc: You need a premium subscription to create affiliate links and earn money from referrals.
